brDecisionText.para:
The elements which must be presented List of effective pages (LEP), are:
<dmCode> or <pmCode> or <externalPubCode>
<identExtension> (if any)
<issueDate> or <externalPublIssueDate> or <externalPublIssue>
<applicRefId>

The attribute which must be presented List of effective pages (LEP), are:
issueType (only N = New/reinstate[-status/-changed/-revised]; C = changed/revised/status;)
